objects.name: Analytic 0679
objects.description: Database enumeration and export activity (e.g., `SELECT * FROM`, `SHOW DATABASES`) issued via ephemeral VMs, admin APIs, or cloud shell from non-monitoring accounts. Defender correlates audit logs (CloudTrail, GCP Admin, AzureDiagnostics), storage write ops, and cross-region transfers by identities not tied to DB operations.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: AWS:CloudTrail
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: rds:ExecuteStatement: Large data access via RDS or Aurora with unknown session context

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: AWS:CloudTrail
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: PutObject: S3 writes with .sql/.csv extension by same identity or within 5 min of DB access

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: AWS:VPCFlowLogs
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Large transfer volume (>20MB) from RDS IP range to external public IPs

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Define which IAM roles/accounts are allowed DB operations
Size threshold (MB) or file pattern for S3-based exfil monitoring
Number of rows/columns or duration to flag long-running queries
